TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: We finally found the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>. My clan would be happy for that, but not me.

SOLANUM: I am thankful for your vision, now I know exactly why it was not easy to find. Those strangers from another star system, they knew everything about the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>, I wish we could too.
SOLANUM: Who knows how many other intelligent life forms it has lured? I don't think I want to know anything more about it. Even in my childhood I knew that it was not waiting for us or anyone else.
SOLANUM: .. Is that Memory Statue active? I wish Ramie could see this. I want to check on its connection with <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.
